mapper.select: SELECT gdinfo.`gdname`,gdimg.`gimgurl`,price.`price`,car.`gdcount`,gdsize.`gstext`,car.`ctid` FROM USER a JOIN cart car ON car.`userid`=a.`userid` JOIN goodsimage gdimg ON gdimg.`gdid`=car.`gdid` JOIN goodsinfo gdinfo ON gdinfo.`gdid`=car.`gdid` JOIN goodssize gdsize ON gdsize.`gsid`=car.`gsid` JOIN goodsprice price ON price.`gdid`=car.`gdid` WHERE gdimg.`gimgtype`=1 AND price.`utid`=1 AND car.userid=#{userid}
